duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and manage security solutions aligned with industry best practices and regulatory standards.
Utilize expertise in security technologies and tools such as Firewall, NGFW, IPS, SIEM, and endpoint security.
Secure cloud environments and virtualized infrastructure to maintain comprehensive protection against cyber threats.
Enhance security incident response procedures and collaborate with incident response teams.
Analyze network traffic, identify anomalies, and implement effective security measures using TCP/IP.
Develop custom security tools, automate security processes using Python programming.
Stay up to date with the latest cybersecurity trends, vulnerabilities, and attack vectors.
Collaborate with internal and external auditors to ensure compliance with industry frameworks such as NIST, CIS, and PCI.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior security team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent technical work experience.
CISSP, Fortinet ISE, Cisco CCNP, Splunk certifications are preferred.
